LDD Sets

Below, you can find a selection of LEGO® Education sets, with all the parts laid out in LEGO® Digital Designer. This could be useful for a number of purposes, including designing things from parts in each set without physically having the set, or if you want to model something you've built from a set in LDD without having to go hunting for parts.

For several years, there was a typo on this page that caused the link to download the Simple_Motorized_9686.lxf file to instead link to an image of that file. This was unfortunate, but it meant that occasionally I'd get an email from someone who used these files, notifing me of the error, whereupon I'd send them a direct link to the file. It was always nice to hear from someone who found use in something I did. So for a while I kept "forgetting" to correct the link. I've now corrected the link, and my new policy is this: If you make use of these files, if you have a suggestion for another set I should include on this page, or if you just want to say hello, feel free to drop me an email using the "contact" link above or contact@johnholbrook.us. I always enjoy hearing from people who use these files.

EV3 Core Set (45544)

Download EV3_Core_45544.lxf

If you are using the rechargeable battery pack, note that it adds an additional beam-width to the EV3's height.
Since the LDD model does not include the battery pack (it uses the 6 AA batteries instead), you will need to keep this disparity in mind when using the EV3 in LDD.

EV3 Expansion Set (45560)

Download EV3_Expansion_45560.lxf

You can also download both the EV3 Core (45544) and Expansion (45560) sets as one LDD file, if you're building something which requires both sets.

NXT Base Set (9797)

Download NXT_Base_9797.lxf

If you are using the rechargeable battery pack, note that it adds an additional beam-width to the NXT's height.
Since the LDD model does not include the battery pack (it uses the 6 AA batteries instead), you will need to keep this disparity in mind when using the NXT in LDD.

NXT Resource Set (9695)

Download NXT_Resource_9695.lxf

You can also download both the NXT Base (9797) and Resource (9695) sets as one LDD file, if you're building a robot that requires both sets.

Simple Machines Set (9689)

Download Simple_Machines_9689.lxf

Simple and Motorized Mechanisms Base Set (9686)

Download Simple_Motorized_9686.lxf
